bio: Kimberly Dayle is a Toronto based Jewellery Designer who holds a Design Degree from the Ontario College of Art and Design, and is a Graduate Gemologist from the Gemological Institute of America’s New York Campus. She currently designs and creates jewellery in Kensington Market, as a member of the White House Studio Project. A combination of whimsical objects, antique aesthetics and fantastical daydreams are what excite and inspire Kimberly’s creative routine. She embraces innovative methods of small-scale production while maintaining primitive techniques at her jewellers bench.
